subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
lead_paragraph: Hamlin passed his teammate Matt Kenseth for the lead with 28 laps to go and went on to claim Toyota’s first win in the Nascar Sprint Cup Series since May with a victory at Martinsville Speedway in Virginia on Sunday.
snippet: Hamlin passed his teammate Matt Kenseth for the lead with 28 laps to go and went on to claim Toyota’s first win in the Nascar Sprint Cup Series since May with a victory at Martinsville Speedway in Virginia on Sunday.
